document_data.name: Intensify Summoning
document_data.mainbody: '''''Intensify summoning''''' was a [[conjuration]] and [[necromancy]] [[spell]] that was used by [[wizard]]s.
document_data.Effects: This spell affected the first two conjuration spells used by the caster within ten minutes of casting, enhancing the strength of the caster's summoned creatures. It could be used on beginner to intermediate conjuration spells.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic]] components, this spell required a small leather pouch and miniature [[silver]] [[candelabra]] to cast.
